hero.description: Passionate about creating incredible digital experiences using the latest web, mobile and research technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a developer passionate about technology and innovation. I love creating digital solutions that solve real problems and improve user experience.
about.story1: I started my journey in technology development several years ago, motivated by curiosity to understand how the applications we use daily work.
about.story2: My experience ranges from web development with React and Next.js to native mobile development for Android with Kotlin. I'm currently expanding my knowledge by learning iOS development with Swift and SwiftUI.
about.story3: I completed my Final Degree Project (TFG), focused on innovative machine learning applications and mobile development, which allows me to combine academic research with practical implementation.
about.story4: I constantly stay updated with the latest technologies and best practices.
about.philosophy: My philosophy is to create technology that improves people's lives, combining innovation with usability.
